description: Slide 1 states '2x faster' deck creation, while Slide 2 claims '3x faster' deck creation speed.
Slide 1 indicates '$2M Saved in lost productivity hours', whereas Slide 2 states '$3M saved in lost productivity hours annually'.
Slide 1 and Slide 7 claim '15 mins Saved per slide created', but Slide 2 states '20 mins saved per slide created'.
Slide 3 claims '50 Hours Saved Per Consultant Monthly' for Noogat, but the sum of the detailed categories on the same slide (10+12+8+6+4) only totals 40 hours.

The total monthly hours saved for Copilot and Gamma contradict between Slide 4 and Slide 5. Slide 4 lists a sum of 6 hours for Copilot (2+3+1) and 3.5 hours for Gamma (1+2+0.5), while Slide 5 (visuals) implies higher totals by including additional categories: 7.5 hours for Copilot (2+3+1+1+0.5) and 4.2 hours for Gamma (1+2+0.5+0.5+0.2).
